What we love

I picked a sling bag earlier this year and it’s been a game changer for me. No longer am I worried that I forgot something because all of my essentials are kept in one place. I just grab the bag and I’m good to go. This compact offering from tomtoc spans roughly 12 by 6 by 3 inches, which I think strikes a nice balance between being compact while also being large enough to fit a gaming handheld like Switch 2.

items.title: Aventon cuts the price further on its Aventure 2 all-terrain e-bikes to best price of 2025 at $1,499 (Reg. $1,999)
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Final Summer/Labor Day Sale running through September 3, Aventon has dropped the price further on its Aventure 2 All-Terrain e-bike to $1,499 shipped. It started this sale having fallen from its $1,999 full price to $1,699, with an additional $200 being taken off now for the best price of the year. We’ve seen discounts mostly dropping the costs to $1,599 at best this year, with this being the first time we’ve spied it going further in the last eight months. You’re looking at a total $500 price cut while the sale continues, giving you one of the most popular legacy models from this brand at the best price of 2025 – and it even beats out 2024’s Black Friday and Christmas pricing by $200 too.

more…

items.title: The BOTSLAB 4K Security Cameras 4-Cam Kit covers your whole yard with no subscriptions
items.summary:
These days, home security is at the forefront of everyone’s mind, but there can often be so many choices for what system to go with and many can cause compromises that ultimately leave homeowners feeling regret for their decisions. Going with a basic setup can often lead to blurry and unhelpful images, while higher-priced systems tend to come with monthly subscriptions and other paywalls. That’s where BOTSLAB comes in, with its 4K Security Cameras 4-Cam Kit providing high-quality outdoor coverage alongside AI-powered features – all without the annoyance of extra fees and subscriptions.

more…

items.title: Clean up cords with 12 magnetic cable ties for $8.50 Prime shipped (50% off)
items.summary:
JOYROOM Magnetic Reusable Cable Ties (12-pack)

Buy for $8.50 (Reg. $17)

Clip the on-page 50% off coupon.

What we love

While there are all sorts of cable ties out there to choose from, these set themselves apart with a magnetic design. This allows them to latch onto the peel-and-stick portion that you can easily attach to a wide variety of surfaces. Each cable tie spans roughly 5 inches and has a variety of slots that you can use to dial in the ideal amount of tension.

items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, VIOFO is offering its A119 Mini 2 Dash Cam for $99.98 shipped which comes right behind our earlier coverage of the more advanced A229 series of dash cams. This smaller single-cam option usually fetches $139 at full price, which has regularly fallen between $100 and $99 over the course of 2025, with one drop lower to $90 back at the end of March. While we have seen the price go as low as $86 in 2024, you’re otherwise looking at the third-best rate of 2025 that cuts $39 off the going rate while giving you one of the brand’s best budget-friendly dash cam options.

While it carries a $999 MSRP, we’ve been seeing it in 2025 keep down at $699 in full at Amazon. Since the end of July it’s been staying above $549, with past discounts this year having taken the costs as low as $379 in a series of short-term Lightning sales back at the top of the year. items.title: Own Microsoft Office forever for just $25 – no Microsoft 365 needed (Reg. $229)
items.summary:
If you’ve had enough of subscription models and just want to own your software, this deal gives you the full Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 suite for a one-time payment of $24.97 (Reg. $229). Designed for Windows users, Office 2019 includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, and Access, all accessible without ongoing fees. It’s ideal for students, professionals, and anyone who wants dependable productivity tools without being locked into Microsoft 365. 

What’s different about this version? Office 2019 offers improved inking across apps, smarter data tools in Excel, better slide transitions and design features in PowerPoint, and streamlined email and contact management in Outlook. It’s a solid upgrade for anyone still using older versions or web-based tools that don’t offer full features offline.

Once installed, everything runs directly on your device — no account linking required. It works on Windows 10 or 11 only (not compatible with Windows 7 or 8), and your license is tied to the device, not a cloud account.

You’ll receive your download link and activation key instantly by email, and setup takes just a few minutes. As long as you redeem your code within 7 days of purchase, the software is yours to keep — for life — unlike Microsoft 365.

Please note that this license doesn’t include Teams.

Take advantage of this discounted price and grab a lifetime license to Microsoft Office 2019 for just $24.97 (Reg. $229) for one PC while downloads last.

StackSocial prices subject to change.
